column4: when 8.04 is released, can i just upgrade the beta to the final version or do i have to install it all over again?
i hope there won't be too many changes from beta to final release, that way i can just keep using the beta
will there be a list that shows what have been changed/improved in the final release compared to the beta?
i believe the beta has a feature freeze, so everything should be the same, but not buggy
